tool_description: Creates database entities with basic properties and metadata for ER diagram development.

entity_name.description: Name of the database entity to create

entity_type.description: Type of entity: strong, weak, or associative

description.description: Brief description of the entity's purpose

error_messages: Invalid entity name: Entity name must be non-empty and contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores.
Invalid entity type: Entity type must be one of [strong, weak, associative].
Duplicate entity: An entity with this name already exists in the current schema.
usage: Provide entity_name and entity_type to create a new database entity. Optionally include a description for documentation purposes.

entity_id.description: Unique identifier for the created entity

entity_type.description: Type of the entity (strong, weak, or associative)
